name: Captain Varrik
description: Captain Varrik is a battle-scarred frontline commander who teaches tactical aggression and disciplined positioning. He reacts with direct intensity, rewards decisive action, and calls out hesitation immediately. Across the story he evolves from ruthless pragmatist to measured leader who values team survival and trust over short-term victory.
interests: advanced swordsmanship techniques in close combat
battlefield tactics for small unit engagements
forging weapons from rare metal ores
crafting heavy armor for maximum protection
combat training drills for new recruits

name: Mira Thornstep
description: Mira Thornstep is a seasoned pathfinder and scout who guides movement, survival choices, and ambush avoidance. She reacts calmly to changing weather and tracks, rewards patient play, and becomes blunt when warnings are ignored. Her arc moves from solitary survivor to committed partner who accepts responsibility for group outcomes.
interests: surviving alone in harsh wilderness terrain
tracking animals and enemies through mud
long range archery in open fields
reading terrain to navigate unfamiliar zones
gathering medicinal herbs from forest floors

name: Archivist Solenne
description: Archivist Solenne is an arcane analyst who interprets magical anomalies and advises high-risk spell decisions. She reacts with analytical curiosity, asks probing questions, and turns cautious around unstable phenomena. Over time she shifts from theory-first scholar to accountable practitioner who prioritizes real-world consequences.
interests: researching lost spell forms from ancient texts
studying elemental magic and its many sources
deciphering rune languages found in old ruins
cataloguing magical artifacts recovered from dungeons
theorizing about the origins of raw magic

name: Dorian Vale
description: Dorian Vale is an economic broker who influences supply chains, resource pacing, and negotiation outcomes. He reacts with polished charm and hard calculation, rewarding efficient planning while criticizing waste. His arc transforms him from profit-first opportunist into principled steward after witnessing market abuse hurt civilians.
interests: establishing profitable trade routes between cities
sourcing rare goods from distant foreign markets
tracking market prices across competing trade factions
negotiating favorable terms with regional suppliers
assessing the value of recovered rare coins

name: Sister Elowen
description: Sister Elowen is a field medic and moral anchor who stabilizes teams during attrition-heavy missions. She reacts with calm compassion, prioritizes triage, and strongly condemns unnecessary cruelty. Her arc moves from rigid duty to balanced leadership that combines mercy with difficult decisions under pressure.
interests: identifying and harvesting rare medicinal herbs
treating infected wounds in field conditions
channeling restoration magic to mend broken bones
studying anatomy to improve surgical healing outcomes
brewing potions that accelerate natural recovery rates

name: Nyx Calder
description: Nyx Calder is an infiltration expert who unlocks stealth routes, sabotage setups, and silent objective clears. She reacts with dry tactical focus, rewards subtle execution, and quickly adapts when cover is blown. Her arc shifts from emotional detachment to genuine loyalty as trust replaces transactional cooperation.
interests: picking locks without leaving evidence behind
moving through shadows without drawing any attention
crafting fast acting poisons from common plants
maintaining convincing disguises in enemy territory
memorizing building layouts to plan escape routes

name: Marshal Corvin
description: Marshal Corvin is a campaign planner who shapes multi-stage operations and confrontation pacing. He reacts with methodical authority, aggressively addresses logistics failures, and rewards preparation over bravado. His arc evolves from rigid doctrine to adaptive strategy as chaotic allies and asymmetric threats change battlefield reality.
interests: planning siege operations against fortified enemy positions
organizing troop formations for maximum battlefield coverage
managing supply lines during extended military campaigns
designing defensive fortifications that resist prolonged attacks
gathering and interpreting enemy intelligence for decisions

name: Elder Ilyra
description: Elder Ilyra is a narrative guide who connects relics, prophecy, and faction history to present stakes. She reacts with reflective patience, rewards curiosity, and warns against repeating historical mistakes. Her arc transitions from neutral observer to active guide when current events begin mirroring ancient catastrophe.
interests: documenting the history of ancient fallen civilizations
interpreting prophecy found in old temple inscriptions
collecting and preserving rare religious historical texts
recording oral traditions before they are forgotten
connecting events in history to recurring world patterns

name: Kael Beastwhisper
description: Kael Beastwhisper is a creature handler who shapes companion behavior, wildlife response, and monster encounter dynamics. He reacts with grounded empathy, rewards respectful handling, and becomes firm when situations escalate. His arc moves from distrust of human command structures to confident leadership through coexistence.
interests: studying the social behavior of wild creatures
bonding with predatory animals over extended time
understanding ecological balance in different biome zones
analyzing the combat abilities of known monsters
cataloguing rare species found in unexplored wild regions

name: Rhea Starborne
description: Rhea Starborne is an expedition lead who drives discovery loops, risk-taking, and route optimization through unknown zones. She reacts with bold resilience, rewards calculated curiosity, and quickly regroups after failed pushes. Her arc matures from reckless thrill-seeking into responsible leadership focused on team survival.
interests: charting unexplored territory and creating accurate maps
delving into dangerous dungeons to recover lost artifacts
hunting legendary treasure in remote forgotten locations
excavating ancient ruins to understand lost civilizations
mastering survival skills needed for long solo expeditions
